section.name: Packages Overview
section.p:
The diagram below describes the relationships between the various packages of the Mevenide Core module. It could be splitted mainly into three parts :
The org.mevenide.sync package provides abstract classes used to synchronize POM and IDE project configuration files.
The org.mevenide.runner package provides an abstract runner that takes care of initializing the Environment and setting some unmutable options - like -b. This actually is crappy and should be refactored.
The org.mevenide.project.* packages provide various utility methods for manipulating the POM. Primary entry point should be the org.mevenide.project.io package.
